tool_description: Discovers and curates relevant research sources including academic papers, industry reports, and credible publications for content research.

source_types.description: Source types: academic, industry_reports, news, government, expert_blogs, white_papers

error_messages: Invalid source type: Use combinations from [academic, industry_reports, news, government, expert_blogs, white_papers]
Invalid date limit: Use one of [1month, 3months, 6months, 1year, 3years, 5years, no_limit]
Invalid credibility score: Must be integer between 1-10
Topic limit exceeded: Maximum 10 research topics allowed
Empty topics array: Provide at least one research topic
usage: Specify research_topics and optionally configure source_types, publication_date_limit, language, and minimum_credibility. Returns curated sources with metadata.

source_urls.description: URLs or identifiers for each source

relevance_scores.description: Relevance scores (0-100) for each source to the research topics
